Name: FAFSA Form - PDF
Description: Free Application for Federal Student Aid. Use this form to apply free for federal and state student grants, work-study and loans.

Name: Federal Student Aid
Description: Offical site of Federal Student Aid, a part of the U.S. Department of Education.

Name: Application Processing System Specifications for Software Developers
Description: This is the specification provided by the Department of Education, targeting developers who are building applications around FAFSA. I derived many of the APIs and datasets from this PDF.

Name: Data.gov - Education
Description: The official location for open data coming out of the Department of Education.

Name: FAFSA on Twitter
Description: Official account of Federal Student Aid, an office of the U.S. Dept. of Education. We provide grants, loans & work-study funds for college & career school.
